intro.title: We are Nyuuly
intro.description: At Nyuuly, we believe that a smooth transition to Japan unlocks happiness and opportunity. Our mission is to provide the tools and support you need for an effortless move. Join us in creating a fulfilling life in Japan!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to empower individuals with the tools and knowledge they need for a seamless transition to life in Japan. We strive to simplify the complexities of relocation, ensuring that every step of your journey is supported and stress-free.

value1.title: Empowerment
value1.description: We empower individuals to take control of their relocation journey.

value2.title: Simplicity
value2.description: We simplify complex processes to make relocation stress-free.

value3.title: Support
value3.description: We provide comprehensive support at every step of the way.

value4.title: Innovation
value4.description: We continuously innovate to improve the relocation experience.

arriveConfidentlyDesc: Feel prepared and secure from day one.
getPlanInOrder: Step 2: Answer a few questions around your move
getPlanInOrderDesc: Track tasks and stay organized with ease.
alwaysOnIntegrator: Step 3: Get moving with the personalised tasklist
alwaysOnIntegratorDesc: Access services and info anytime, anywhere.
supportingYourJourney: Supporting every step of your journey with Nyuuly
taskListDescription: The task list provides you with guides for a smooth transition to Japan, whether it's before your departure, after your arrival, or while you're settling into life in Japan.
taskListGuides: You can find various guides related to living in Japan here, whether it's about work, housing, or banking, and more.
taskListFeature: The task list feature helps you stay organized and on track during your move to Japan.
citiesInGunma: 12 cities are located in Gunma Prefecture
faqQuestion1: How do I get started with Nyuuly?
faqQuestion2: Is Nyuuly available in multiple languages?
faqQuestion3: Can I use Nyuuly on my mobile device?
faqQuestion4: How often is the information updated?
faqQuestion5: Is there a cost to use Nyuuly?
getStartedWithTasklist: Get started with our tasklist and personalised reminders for you
reasonJapan2: Get your plan in order, all in one place
reasonJapan3: Always on integrator for all your needs
reasonJapan4: This tool has significantly improved our team's productivity and collaboration.
